content.p: We use our research into how language is used in real-life work environments to inform training, courses and consultancy with the aim of improving global communication. To find out more or to discuss working with us, please contact us. Email Twitter Linkedin Facebook In these innovative degree programmes, you will be introduced to key linguistics concepts and research on professional communication, as well as the means to apply these practically to enhance workplace practice. This two-day conference brings together university teachers and educators, learning technologists, practitioners and students to share the concepts, practices and technical applications that will form the educational settings of the future.
